message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you considering it.  I could come down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that. I believe this product is worth the value it brings.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $85. If you're not willing to come down, I'm going to have to look at other options.
